text:
Anyway love to see the bold feminist take of “half the books in a genre overwhelmingly written by women are in fact ripoffs of a 15-year-old cartoon written by men because they have one of the following:
- elemental magic
- international conflict 
- Asian representation”

It’s a lazy, racist comparison followed by a weird swing at one of the genres/age categories where WOC are truly changing the game. And no, I don’t expect people to be aware of that by default. But I do expect people to know what they’re making into a punchline.

I haven’t seen Raya yet and I understand there are issues, but comparing it to ATLA, a show that was entirely written and helmed by white people, is already yikes 😬😬😬 And then throwing in a jab at YA fantasy, when we were for once minding our own business elsewhere!!?!?
There’s just!!! So much!!!! To unpack!!!!  And I get it’s a throwaway tweet but when you have over 300k followers there IS NO SUCH THING AS A THROWAWAY TWEET.
Should’ve saved this one for the DMs, methinks https://t.co/P7rOmAlzpb
